Name: Teresa
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Joseph Cartron Double Crème de Cassis de Bourgogne
4 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water) optional
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Review: Previously, I've reduced the lime juice (to 20ml) and upped the cassis (to 30ml) in a quest to make this bittersweet 'n' sour aperitivo a touch more approachable. However, even then, the Teresa remains on the bitter and sour side, so I've reverted to the accepted spec from Gary "gaz" Regan's 2003 The Joy of Mixology .
History: Adapted from a recipe by Rafael Ballesteros of Spain, the Teresa came to prominence in Gary "gaz" Regan's 2003 The Joy of Mixology .
Nutrition: One serving of Teresa contains 207 calories
